DarkMouse::

She stopped and stared at Galvatron. "I know how he thinks to. I have 
dealt with him and his clone. If he is anywhere on this miserable 
planet, I'll find him. And then, I'll extinguish his spark." She 
gently rubbed the scar that ran from her forehead down to her 
cheek. "I owe him big time."  She turned and walked into her room.  
She looked around the room. It was lavishly furnished, well, 
comparatively speaking. She was used to caves, old wrecks and holes 
in the ground. This was like a 20 star hotel on Cybertron. She 
transformed into bot mode and walked over to a pluch chair. She sat 
down and folded her hands behind her head. Giving out a sigh of 
relief and enjoyment,"Ahhhhh, this is the life. I should have done 
this a long time ago. this sure beats the hole in the ground that 
I've been occuping lately." she smiled and closed her optics. She 
enjoyed being able to relax and not worry about getting shot for 
once.  She opened her optics and smiled. "Yeah, this is the way a 
mouse should live."
She wondered what was going to happen and how she was going to get 
back at Megaton. Such things like revenge needed careful plotting. 
And that required energy she didn't have right then. She relaxed and 
slowly started to fall asleep in the chair.  



--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  He laughed. "The decepticons our my major worry. They're is a lot 
of them 
> and they're very cunning...plus they're lead by the original 
megatron....he 
> was cloned from my spark. I know how he thinks..and im sure they'll 
be a 
> problem."
